channel.title: cavity on Automated API and Unit testing Docs for OpenFOAM libs
channel.description: Recent content in cavity on Automated API and Unit testing Docs for OpenFOAM libs

item.title: Unit tests for lib2 - sampleClass
item.description: Note: The unit tests pages are automatically generated from the test reports. Some important points to mention: The random number generator is seeded with the same seed for parallel/serial runs for the same test case. Number of passing tests is the “effective” one (including the ones that fail but are expected to fail)". Number of failing tests is the “effective” one (only the ones that fail and are not expected to fail)".
